text: (ikkaranankal; illatu) allah avarkalai vetanai ceyyamalirukka (veru karanam) enna irukkiratu? Avarkal (kahpavin) kariyastarkalaka illata nilaiyil anta cankaiyana pallikku (makkal celvatai)t tatukkinranar; atan kariyastarkal payapaktiyutaiyavarkaleyanri (verevarum) irukkamutiyatu eninum avarkalil perum palor (itanai) ariyamattarkal
